inclusion.criterion: fever > 38°C and uropathy or urinary tract infection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: obtaining the authorization of the holders of parental authority
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: antibiotic therapy in the last 48 hours
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent UTIs and is currently being treated for urosepsis, but does not exhibit signs of vital distress or contraindications to bladder catheterization.
